content: Below you will find a list of all known Bosses in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong, in the order they are listed in the journal. Click on a Boss below to get in-depth guides for where you can find them, and strategies for defeating them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_1-Black_Cloud,_Red_Fire.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 1 Walkthrough Sections', specifically from the subsection 'List of Chapter 1 Bosses'.
The content is as follows:
Below you will find a list of all known Bosses in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong, in the order they are listed in the journal. Click on a Boss below to get in-depth guides for where you can find them, and strategies for defeating them.
